{{- /* }} Supported schemas: - Website (homepage) - Organization or Person (homepage) - BreadcrumbList (all pages, except homepage) - Article (Article sections — globally defined) - NewsArticle (NewsArticle sections — globally defined) - BlogPosting (BlogPosting sections — globally defined) - Product (Product sections — globally defined) Resources: - https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/structured-data/search-gallery - https://schema.org/docs/schemas.html - https://bullaki.com/projects/web-design/seo-with-hugo-5-breadcrumbs/ - https://bullaki.com/projects/web-design/seo-with-hugo-4-structured-data-markup/ - https://developer.yoast.com/features/schema/pieces/ {{ */}} {{- /* Initialize. */}} {{- $s := slice "Organization" "Person" }} {{- $v := delimit $s ", " " or "}} {{- $t := site.Params.seo.schemas.type }} {{- $a := site.Params.seo.schemas.article }} {{- $b := site.Params.seo.schemas.blogPosting }} {{- $n := site.Params.seo.schemas.newsArticle }} {{- $p := site.Params.seo.schemas.product }} {{- if .IsHome }} {{- /* Parse Website schema. */}} {{- partial "seo/schemas/website" . }} {{- /* Validate schema type. */}} {{- if in $s $t }} {{- /* Determine schema path. */}} {{- $p := printf `seo/schemas/%s` ( $t | lower ) }} {{- /* Parse Organization or Person schema. */}} {{- partial $p }} {{- else }} {{- warnf "[Thulite SEO] Unsupported schema type: %s. Set %s in .Site.Params.seo.schemas.type" $t $v }} {{- end }} {{- else }} {{- /* Parse BreadcrumbList schema. */}} {{- partial "seo/schemas/breadcrumb" . }} {{- end }} {{- /* Parse Article schema. */}} {{- if and (in $a .Section) (.IsPage) }} {{- partial "seo/schemas/article" . }} {{- end }} {{- /* Parse NewsArticle schema. */}} {{- if and (in $n .Section) (.IsPage) }} {{- partial "seo/schemas/newsarticle" . }} {{- end }} {{- /* Parse BlogPosting schema. */}} {{- if and (in $b .Section) (.IsPage) }} {{- partial "seo/schemas/blogposting" . }} {{- end }} {{- /* Parse Product schema. */}} {{- if and (in $p .Section) (.IsPage) }} {{- partial "seo/schemas/product" . }} {{- end }}
